title: (x) very bold serif "Foundation" - Bianca (similar to Bembo) {Mike Y {Norbert)}
author: evan

comments.content: Doesn't look anything like a Goudy to me. Serifs are too sharp. Aren't goudy's rounded?

Looks closer to [Bembo Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228165112/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bembo/extra-bold/) and then reworked parts of it.

Still looking for a better match.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228165112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bembo-xbold2_5083.png)

Norbert, I think you basically have it. I think it is an extra dark version of Bembo that was issued by FontBank called ['Bianca'](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228165112/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/bianca.htm).(They also had a similar one with a lower x-height called 'Benson'.)

_(Whenever there seems to be a very heavy weight of a text font, that's one of the first collections I look at.)_

- Mike Yanega

Wow, Mike... I would never have found that one!  
That's it, at only $2 (and looks like you get your two bucks worth).
